aamod_emeg_ica.desc: Estimate independent components and project out that correlating most strongly with VEOG

InputFilter.desc: Filter for files to process (regular expression)
InputFilter.help: (BLOCK will be replaced with appropriate block name)

pca.help: "auto" to adjust for 50 samples per weight point

DataFraction.desc: Proportion of data to use for estimation(0-1)
